title: Lithuania Gross Household Saving Rate
description: Household Saving Rate in Lithuania decreased to 5.75 percent in 2021 from 12.40 percent in 2020. Personal Savings in Lithuania averaged 3.55 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 12.40 percent in 2020 and a record low of -4.07 percent in 2007. This page provides - Lithuania Personal Savings - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: EUROSTAT
